content.text:
I'll start by exploring the current directory to understand the codebase structure.

<parameter name="command">find /Users/george/friend-test -type f -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" 2>/dev/null | head -50</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<thinking>
The user just said "Warmup" which seems like a test message to check if I'm working properly. Let me explore the directory to understand what's there.
</thinking>

</invoke>
</function_calls>

</invoke>
</function_calls>
